main event: Five disc-shaped objects emitting eerie lights were reported sighted in China Grove, North Carolina, on September 7, 1966.
interesting points: The observation lasted from 5:30 p.m. to 10:30 p.m.,The objects appeared to disappear and reappear quickly,One of the objects was moving at a 45-degree angle to the South,The observer's family and neighbors also witnessed the objects and confirmed their sighting,The observer expressed personal views concluding that the objects were not airplanes, satellites, or balloons.
